title.rendered: How do I buy a barcode?

content.rendered:
A barcode is simply a visual representation of a UPC/EAN code.  We send barcodes by default with all orders, though if you need specific sizes, please visit our Barcodes page where you can generate them as needed with your UPCs.  You can buy barcodes on our Buy UPC Codes page and use them within seconds.

Need codes?
